first_para: Madeleine Moon (born 27 March 1950) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bridgend since 2005, succeeding Win Griffiths, who retired from politics.

full.extract: Madeleine Moon (born 27 March 1950) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bridgend since 2005, succeeding Win Griffiths, who retired from politics.
full.title: Madeleine Moon
